DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct multi-centre , randomize , investigator-blind , active vehicle-controlled , intra-individual study . The purpose study confirm Metvix NDL-PDT procedure similar efficacy less painful compare Metvix c-PDT procedure treatment mild moderate AKs . In addition study include Metvix NDL-PDT arm versus Metvix vehicle cream c PDT ( Placebo ) ass sensitivity trial .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 3b Study Metvix NDL-PDT Versus Metvix c-PDT Subjects With Actinic Keratoses
